unnormalised: In yesterday's cricket match at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai, India secured a victory against Australia. The final score was India 285/7 in 50 overs, and Australia 245 all out in 48.2 overs. Virat Kohli scored a century, hitting 103 runs off 120 balls, earning him the Man of the Match award.
normalised: In yesterday's cricket match at Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai, India secured a victory against Australia. The final score was India two hundred and eighty five for seven in fifty overs, and Australia two hundred and forty five all out in forty eight point two overs. Virat Kohli scored a century, hitting one hundred and three runs off one hundred and twenty balls, earning him the Man of the Match award.

unnormalised: Rohit Sharma contributed 45 runs, while Hardik Pandya took 3 wickets for 40 runs. The Australian team's top scorer was Steve Smith, with 65 runs. The match saw a total of 15 sixes and 30 fours. Attendance at the stadium was recorded at 35,000 spectators.
normalised: Rohit Sharma contributed forty five runs, while Hardik Pandya took three wickets for forty runs. The Australian team's top scorer was Steve Smith, with sixty five runs. The match saw a total of fifteen sixes and thirty fours. Attendance at the stadium was recorded at thirty five thousand spectators.

unnormalised: According to ESPN, India's win percentage against Australia in ODIs now stands at 55.5%. The next match in the series is scheduled for 18/10/2024 in Chennai. The current series score is India 1 - Australia 0.
normalised: According to E-S-P-N, India's win percentage against Australia in O-D-I's now stands at fifty five point five percent. The next match in the series is scheduled for eighteenth october two thousand and twenty four in Chennai. The current series score is India one - Australia zero.
